exclusion_reason: Study primary objective was investigating the association of DMO and vitreous detachment. Cases were eyes with DMO on biomicroscopy; control eyes included eyes of diabetic patients without DMO on biomicroscopy and OCT. Thus, both OCT and biomicroscopy were used to define disease status, which is invalid to determine diagnostic accuracy.
